name: Ceann
description: '''Ceann''' is an American [[rock music|rock]] band from [[Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania]] Most commonly known for their song "Pittsburgh Makes Me Drunk". Their influences include [[Pat McCurdy]], [[The Kingston Trio]], [[Great Big Sea]], [[Cake (band)|Cake]], [[The Pogues]], [[Johnny Cash]], [[Flogging Molly]], [[Ween]], [[They Might Be Giants]], The Town Pants, [[Barenaked Ladies]] and [[Willie Nelson]].
